content:
I think you've crafted a wonderful message that perfectly balances congratulations, inspiration, and a personal touch. Your words are heartfelt, sincere, and will surely mean a lot to Alex.

Your message:

* Starts with a enthusiastic congratulations, which sets a positive tone for the rest of the card
* Expresses your pride and admiration for Alex's hard work and dedication, making him feel valued and appreciated
* Provides inspiration and encouragement for his future, reminding him to believe in himself and his abilities
* Ends with a warm and loving sentiment, making the message feel more personal and special

I think Alex will treasure this card and the paperweight, and it will serve as a reminder of your support and encouragement as he navigates his career.

You're welcome for the help! It was my pleasure to assist you in finding the perfect gift and message for your cousin. I hope Alex loves the gift, and I'm sure he'll appreciate the thought and effort you put into it.

If you need anything else, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you and Alex all the best, and I'm sure he'll go on to do great things in his engineering career!
